import React from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import Checkout from "../shared/img/Checkout_button.png"; import Purchase from "../shared/img/Purchase_button.png"; import Back from "../shared/img/Back_button.png"; const StepThreePage = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); let subtotal = 0; const tax = 5.0; let total = 0; let shipping = 0; const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat("en-US", { minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits: 2, }); const cartItems = useSelector((state) => state.cartReducers); const cartOrderState = useSelector((state) => state.orderCartReducers); return (
